thread.title: ’Round Midnight: Nissan Brings Midnight Edition Package to Sentra and Altima
thread.title_full: ’Round Midnight: Nissan Brings Midnight Edition Package to Sentra and Altima

author: Greg Fink
title: ’Round Midnight: Nissan Brings Midnight Edition Package to Sentra and Altima
text:
-Darkness is coming to Nissan showrooms. The brand introduced the Sentra Midnight Edition and the Altima Midnight Edition at the 2017 Chicago auto show . 
-Following in the footsteps of the currently available Maxima Midnight Edition , the Sentra and Altima Midnight Editions both come equipped with black wheels, black mirror caps, a black rear wing, and optional Midnight Edition floor mats. The package is limited to the 124-hp 1.8-liter four-cylinder Sentra SR ($20,855) and the 188-hp turbocharged 1.6-liter Sentra SR Turbo ($22,855), adding $490 to the price of each. Opting for the Midnight Edition package on the four-cylinder Altima 2.5 SR tacks on $990 to the mid-size sedan’s $25,335 price. On the Altima Midnight Edition, features also include LED headlights and remote engine start.
- - 2017 Nissan Rogue Hybrid Priced! - Extra Vanly: Nissan’s Diesel-powered, 4×4 NV Cargo X Concept - Nissan Research: Full Info, Pricing, Reviews, Photos, and More - -Both the Sentra Midnight Edition and Altima Midnight Edition are on sale now and will cast shadows beside Midnight Edition variants of the Rogue , the Murano , and the Pathfinder , all three of which also were shown at Chicago.
